ygData.subject: Re: Class Poll
ygData.msgSnippet: In a message dated 10/15/99 10:30:54 PM Pacific Daylight Time, blizzard15@mindspring.com writes:
ygData.messageBody:
In a message dated 10/15/99 10:30:54 PM Pacific Daylight Time,
blizzard15@... writes:

<< Which class do you all think peaks the latest in the game in fun and
power? I'm just interested to know what you think. Thanks for your time. >>

If you read power as damage then Wizards of course. If you read power as
versatility I would say Bards.
I would also say bards for the fun one too. Im only level 31 but I have had
the greatest time being a bard. I guess everyone just has to find that one
class that is perfect for them :)

Renaldo
